      Starts the game Keeps running until the game is finished

    • isGameFull

      public boolean isGameFull()
      Only allows 2 players in the game
      Returns:
      true if the max amount of players joined the game or false if there isn't enough players available to start the game

    • acceptPlayer

      public void acceptPlayer(Socket playerSocket)
      Accepts a new player into the game
      Parameters:
      playerSocket - the socket from the client that connected

    • playRound

      public void playRound()
      Counts the rounds Informs players if it's their turn Checks when the /question or /guess commands are executed by the player in the active turn Checks if game conditions to end are reached
